titles.title: Liberty, Liberty My Spirit's Singing Liberty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Liberty, Liberty My Spirit's Singing Liberty,
What sweet liberty I've found in Him.
Liberty to love Him, liberty to praise Him,
Jesus is my liberty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Libre, libre mi espíritu es libre
Libre me hizo Jesús, para amarle,
Para adorarle, libre me hizo Jesús.
